problem_text: For each pair of integers n ≥ 2 and r ≥ 3, determine the smallest integer k(= h′(n, r)) such that in each set of k points in general position^1 in E^n there is an r-pointed set X having each of its points as an extreme point of its convex hull (equivalently, no point of X is in the convex hull of the remaining points of X).
